ai-snp5.13:1.3_0: for he does not abandon the flood,
ai-snp5.13:1.4_0: the speculation-leaver, the intelligent one - (him) I beg,
ai-snp5.13:1.5_0: will not be able to hear the other,
ai-snp5.13:2.1_0: Various people have come from the countries,
ai-snp5.13:2.2_0: and are waiting for your saying, O hero,
ai-snp5.13:2.3_0: you must explain (the Teaching) properly to them,
ai-snp5.13:2.4_0: for this Teaching has been understood by you.”
ai-snp5.13:3.1_0: “You should remove all cravings, O Vinaya,
ai-snp5.13:3.3_0: above, below, and across the middle,
ai-snp5.13:3.4_0: for they are attached to the world.
ai-snp5.13:3.5_0: For that person who is unable to prepare a person.
ai-snp5.13:4.1_0: Therefore knowing (this), the mindful monk should
ai-snp5.13:4.2_0: a monastic in the whole world with its gods,
ai-snp5.13:4.3_0: seeing that with what is called attachment to cling,
ai-snp5.13:4.4_0: when a person gives it up in the presence of death.”
ai-snp5.13:4.5_0: Queen Bhadrāṇasī and Twelve (requent) in twelve (years)
